meanings.definition: A volatile liquid hydrocarbon used as a refrigerant.
meanings.sent1: The rhigolene leaked out of the refrigerator, causing a cold mist to form.
meanings.sent2: The technician refilled the air conditioner with rhigolene to make it colder.
meanings.sent3: When the rhigolene spilled, it froze into a mini ice rink on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The rhigolene flowed through the pipes like a chilly river of magic.
meanings.sent5: The smell of rhigolene lingered in the air, reminding everyone of the cold storage room.

meanings.definition: To chill or cool with rhigolene.
meanings.sent1: The chef decided to rhigolene the dessert before serving it.
meanings.sent2: She used a special machine to rhigolene the drinks for the party.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they watched their dad accidentally rhigolene himself with the spray.
meanings.sent4: The icy wind rhigolened the room, making everyone shiver.
meanings.sent5: The scientist carefully rhigolened the experiment to keep it at the right temperature.
